name: UNTITLED DICE GAME (N8012)
description:
In this game you play as an alien who abducts Romans in order to save them from giant dice rolling down the street. The levels are randomly generated. 

Game was made for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours.

I used Unreal Engine 4, 8bit Painter, Soundtrap Studio and www.sfxr.me
